title: BountySujon
author: BountySujon
content: hello I have some questions about being a Bounty Manager Where can I find Project Winners?  How to contact them If anyone knows, please provide the link

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: not know yet something about it....

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: BountySujon on February 19, 2023, 04:23:36 AMhello I have some questions about being a Bounty Manager Where can I find Project Winners?  How to contact them If anyone knows, please provide the linkProject winners? You mean great projects for bounty? Usually its a myth. Only few projects are solid when it comes to bounty and majority of them are scam or low budget project.If you are looking for great bounty managers, just visit service section almost all of the quality one are there. Like Hhampuz, Royse777, Yahoo, and many experience ones.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Quote from: BountySujon on February 19, 2023, 04:23:36 AMhello I have some questions about being a Bounty Manager Where can I find Project Winners? I guess you meant about legit bounty, right? If that's true and then you can find that by yourself. You wanna be a bounty manager but you didn't know where to start. Try to building your portfolios and reputation by creating a proposal that can be offered to the developers. If you wanna get a legit bounty and then you shall be active like discovering the legit project through various ico list site. This will help you a lot to do that. Quote from: BountySujon on February 19, 2023, 04:23:36 AM How to contact them If anyone knows, please provide the linkThere's no way to contact them other than try to join in their social media channel and then get in touch with admin to send your proposal to the CEO or owner of the project.

comments.author: iv4n
comments.body: Quote from: Royse777 on February 05, 2023, 08:22:30 AM...Side idea: I am thinking to launch a bitcointalk campaign management course. You will be learning:Chapter 1- How to approach to a client- How to plan your sales pitch- How to follow up- How to close a dealChapter 2- How to make up-sales- Report handling- How to handle unsatisfying clients- How to continue good relationship with your client and become useful for their businessChapter 3- Recruitment trainingChapter 4- How to manage your team - How to train your team and bring the best out from themChapter 5- Personal development training- Personal branding training12 weeks course. Each week 10 hours, total 120 hours duration. One to one tuition. You will be with me on Telegram chat, and everything will be done by texting, no voice, no conference. Per hour rate: $35For OP 50% discount, limited time offer.Terms: I may change my mind, I reserve all the rights to accept and deny any application./SarcasmRoyse777 explained! I'm not sure if it's just a joke about the "12th-week course" or not, but if you are interested you can definitely contact Royse anytime, here on the forum or in the telegram group. I hope this helps...Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on February 19, 2023, 07:58:03 AMQuote from: BountySujon on February 19, 2023, 04:23:36 AMhello I have some questions about being a Bounty Manager Where can I find Project Winners?  How to contact them If anyone knows, please provide the linkProject winners? You mean great projects for bounty? Usually its a myth. Only few projects are solid when it comes to bounty and majority of them are scam or low budget project.If you are looking for great bounty managers, just visit service section almost all of the quality one are there. Like Hhampuz, Royse777, Yahoo, and many experience ones. I am also not sure what "project winners" mean... I think OP wishes to become a bounty manager, but he doesn't know where to start, more specifically where to find projects that wish to higher bounty managers.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: I have spent the last 2 years watching campaigns in the bounty section and reviewing the post history of many managers. Of course, I did not focus much on the managers I know because they manage signature campaigns in the main section that pay in bitcoins. What caught my attention is the presence of managers with new memberships or low membership ranks without having prior experience in running campaigns or having a positive history of trust in any way. Some of them are managing more than one campaign at the same time, and I wondered how these newcomers to the forum were able to enjoy the provision of campaign managing services, and if they were veteran members using new accounts, why do they not disclose this or how entrepreneurs can find them and Trust them on this same basis?I'm beginning to suspect that someone is offering campaign management services on other sites that aren't BitcoinTalk.

comments.author: abel1337
comments.body: It's not that easy to find such projects. Finding projects and getting you as their bounty manager is hard. You should evaluate yourself if you can manage a campaign, I believe that asking questions like this easily won't quality you in becoming a campaign manager. There are so many competitors in the market and there are some who is way better than most of bounty manager who is finding campaigns. They have there own weapons such as portfolio, experience and necessary skills how to manage the campaign right including on how to find a campaign also on how to close deals. Projects won't settle for  less, This is why I think those who are old or veterans in managing a bounty campaign simply is the go to of projects in choosing their bounty manager.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: There is a point that I do not understand how it is determined, which is the number of participants in the campaign and the payments that they will receive. This means that these points are determined by the manager based on the budget allocated to the campaign, or are they determined by the project owners.Also, how is the campaign judged as successful or not? For example, from the view of the manager, the campaign is called successful as long as it is in accordance with the forum rules and the participants are committed to the rules. And from the perspective of the campaign owner, the campaign should increase the number of people coming to the service. what do you think?Bounty campaigns seem more difficult to manage and complex to me, although I do not see serious managers dealing with them.When I asked about the programs, I thought of the participants in the Twitter and Facebook campaign, whose number sometimes exceeds a thousand. I do not imagine that the supervisor counts all of them. And so I imagined that there are programs that help him.

comments.author: leonair
comments.body: Quote from: BountySujon on February 19, 2023, 04:23:36 AMhelloWhere can I find Project Winners? You will never find the project winner because he is dead    But you can find the project owner. But a project owner usually doesn't waste time talking to strangers. If you want to talk about the bounty, you can contact the project's marketing department.  You can email them or find them on Telegram, Discord and other chat roomsQuoteHow to contact them If anyone knows, please provide the linkThere is a strategy and technique to contracting project team and convince team to run a bounty campaign with him. Which a bounty managers know best. And everyone uses there own strategy and no one will ever tell anyone's secret. So you move on from your own thoughts good luck

comments.author: Oneandpure
comments.body: Its seems not wrong with your ambition become Bounties Campaign Manager but looking with your account level seems difficult get trusted from some project for handle or running bounties campaign. Several bounty campaign manager have good trust and they are smart how handle many kinds of bounties campaign.But most important become bounty campaign manager not only handle campaign running but how to manage with trusted project or not because need responsibility later with participants payment reward if bounty scam or not paying member. Lets build your account reputation and push up to higher level if you want to try become bounty campaign manager.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Kavelj22 on February 19, 2023, 02:33:03 PMWhat caught my attention is the presence of managers with new memberships or low membership ranks without having prior experience in running campaigns or having a positive history of trust in any way. Thats probably either the account is made by the company itself or known contact to a member of this forum. Usually some active member here could make their ways to finding some project that are indeed needed someone here which that someone isnt familiar of the reputation and ranking here.Quote from: Kavelj22 on February 19, 2023, 02:33:03 PMSome of them are managing more than one campaign at the same time, and I wondered how these newcomers to the forum were able to enjoy the provision of campaign managing services, and if they were veteran members using new accounts, why do they not disclose this or how entrepreneurs can find them and Trust them on this same basis?They are probably active outside the forum and if you arent aware, there are more ways to do campaign and much modern using social platforms. Ive been noticing them increasing btw. I doubt that they are veterans member creating account cause that would be a hard task and retaining his position as an old member, someone would noticed if ever.

comments.author: Kavelj22
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on February 20, 2023, 07:44:46 AMQuote from: Kavelj22 on February 19, 2023, 02:33:03 PMSome of them are managing more than one campaign at the same time, and I wondered how these newcomers to the forum were able to enjoy the provision of campaign managing services, and if they were veteran members using new accounts, why do they not disclose this or how entrepreneurs can find them and Trust them on this same basis?They are probably active outside the forum and if you arent aware, there are more ways to do campaign and much modern using social platforms. Ive been noticing them increasing btw. I doubt that they are veterans member creating account cause that would be a hard task and retaining his position as an old member, someone would noticed if ever. There are trusted members who run Bitcoin campaigns and at the same time run Bounty campaigns for alternative currencies, as these campaigns contain rewards for participating in Twitter, Facebook, and others. Does this mean that they have software to help them perform their tasks or that they don't really keep track of all subscribers?The evaluation process is easy if we rely only on signature campaigns that pay in bitcoins, but it remains incomplete if we forget about bounty campaigns for alternative currencies.

comments.author: mdzahed134
comments.body: Quote from: Oneandpure on February 19, 2023, 06:00:28 PMIts seems not wrong with your ambition become Bounties Campaign Manager but looking with your account level seems difficult get trusted from some project for handle or running bounties campaign. Several bounty campaign manager have good trust and they are smart how handle many kinds of bounties campaign.Yeah, account rank is very important to get projects but it’s not impossible to becoming a bounty manager with newbie rank because i've seen a few newbie account already managed bounties regularly but mostly SCAM projects, they just promoting such projects for some money, don't care about hunters hunters payment.

comments.author: judeafante
comments.body: Quote from: BountySujon on February 19, 2023, 04:23:36 AMhello I have some questions about being a Bounty Manager Where can I find Project Winners?  How to contact them If anyone knows, please provide the linkCommunication is very important if you aspire to be a bounty manager you need to have a good choice of words that people can understand, honestly, I don't know what you mean by project winners is it bounty managers or managers that you can apply as bounty manager, before aspiring to be a bounty manager learn how bounty managers works and thinks and one of this is knowledge on where to find the best project and how to properly offer your service.

comments.author: Quidat
comments.body: Quote from: BountySujon on February 19, 2023, 04:23:36 AMhello I have some questions about being a Bounty Manager Where can I find Project Winners?  How to contact them If anyone knows, please provide the linkProject winners supposed to be those good or solid projects which we do know that it is on someone on how they would be making their own research or simply Dyor.We are seeingtons of projects that we do have in the market and there's no way that you could simply pick out which one you would be tending to have that community handling and besidesthere are already some current known reputable BM's out there on this market which means that chances on getting picked is almost close to impossible.Its been stated above by some members about those precise path on how you would be making yourself to be a BM.Its a good list to follow.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: BountySujon on February 19, 2023, 04:23:36 AMhello I have some questions about being a Bounty Manager Where can I find Project Winners?  How to contact them If anyone knows, please provide the linkif you have to ask such things, maybe you should think about whether that job is for you, that is, whether you are for that type of job.The campaign manager must be the one who starts the initiative, leads part of the project, presents it and controls the effect of a large number of participants (bounty hunters). if you have to ask how to start, what will happen to the first obstacle you come across and who will bear the consequences of your insecurity? think honestly, about whether you, as the project starter, would leave marketing in the hands of someone who does not know how to start.
